title: Region transfer
body:
Now that the rewards are distributed in all the riot regions, will they re-enable the transfer between regions or it might take a while ? 

thanks for answer !

replies.body: Not everything is done just yet, so my guess is that it may still be a bit.  I don't really have concrete info on this though until access is restore, so I recommend bookmarking the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay up to date on that.  Hang tight!
